attributes.action: Public Enquiry into all matters petitioned on the www.bentcop.biz petitions site
attributes.additional_details: Fully documented archives & petitions online at www.bentcop.biz & www.bentcop.boards.net
attributes.background: I have investigated, researched and petitioned for connected causes in relation to my cause. I present my evidence and petitions to parliament. This petition is for the concerns to be fully investigated by Parliament through i public enquiry. Please visit www.bentcop.biz & www.bentcop.boards.net
